traits.name: Warforged Resilience
entries: The warforged has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition poisoned} and is immune to disease. Magic can't put it to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The warforged makes two armblade attacks.

actions.name: Armblade
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
